RAW.SOURCE:
` *---------------------------------------------------------------------* * Report YGPL_ADVANCED_SGEN *---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT ygpl_advanced_sgen MESSAGE-ID zaplink LINE-SIZE 256.
TABLES: tadir, tdevc. TYPE-POOLS: abap, icon.
*TYPES to_synch TYPE REF TO zaplink_raw_data. " to be the first object meet in standalone generator
SELECT-OPTIONS: s_srcs FOR tadir-srcsystem DEFAULT sy-sysid, s_soft FOR tdevc-dlvunit, s_type FOR tadir-object, s_name FOR tadir-obj_name, s_pack FOR tadir-devclass. PARAMETERS: p_ext TYPE abap_bool AS CHECKBOX DEFAULT abap_true. SELECT-OPTIONS: s_author FOR tadir-author DEFAULT sy-uname.
START-OF-SELECTION. DATA t_list TYPE ygpl_generate=>tt_compkeys. DATA t_list_ko TYPE ygpl_generate=>tt_compkeys. DATA o_gen TYPE REF TO ygpl_generate. FIELD-SYMBOLS: <i> LIKE LINE OF t_list.
t_list = ygpl_generate=>get_keys_from_tadir( " Issue 1 srcsystem = s_srcs[] softcomp = s_soft[] type = s_type[] name = s_name[] packages = s_pack[] ext = p_ext author = s_author[] ).
CREATE OBJECT o_gen EXPORTING obj_list = t_list.
t_list_ko = o_gen->generate( ).
SORT t_list_ko BY type name. WRITE:/ 'List of components :'(cpl). LOOP AT t_list ASSIGNING <i>. READ TABLE t_list_ko TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS WITH KEY type = <i>-type name = <i>-name BINARY SEARCH. IF sy-subrc = 0. WRITE:/ icon_red_light AS ICON. ELSE. WRITE:/ icon_green_light AS ICON. ENDIF. WRITE: <i>-type, <i>-name. ENDLOOP.
END-OF-SELECTION.

ITEM.ENTRY: ZAPLink : Extraction en masse de componsants
